entry.title: Cartographer
entry.summary: In this message, the sender accuses Mike Hearn of attempting to introduce privacy leaks and weaknesses in the Bitcoin ecosystem, as well as using logical fallacies such as ad hominem attacks, disruption, and FUD. The sender questions why Hearn responds to objections with hand waving and misdirection instead of sound technical reasoning, and references a pull-request Hearn made in the past that was flawed and vulnerable to attack. The sender suggests that Hearn's behavior is calculated and planned, given his intelligence, education, and experience. The message includes several references to Reddit threads and a YouTube video discussing Hearn's actions and proposals.
